title: Perfect
content:
[G]I found a love for [Em]me
[Em]Darling just dive right [C]in
[Am]And follow my lead
[G]Well I found a girl, [Em]beautiful and sweet G]I found a love for [Em]me
[Em]Darling just dive right [C]in

title: Shape of You
content:
[C#m]The club isn't the best place to [E]find a lover
[C#m]So the bar is where I [E]go
[C#m]Me and my friends at the [E]table doing shots

title: Let It Be
content:
[C]When I find myself in [G]times of trouble
[Am]Mother Mary comes to [F]me
[C]Speaking words of [G]wisdom, let it [F]be

title: Pavaan Naam
content:
Verse 1
 Sa[Em]ri dunia [C]mein gung raha tere naam
 Yeshu na[D]am yeshu [Em]naam
 Sa[Em]ri bigdi bana [C]raha tera naam
 Yeshu na[D]am yeahu [Em]naam 
 Chorus
 Y[G]ougya hai tu [Am]yogya hai
 S[D]tuti Prasansa[G] ke
 Aur[Em] koi nahi [Am]kabhi nahi
 Ter[C]i jagha le s[D]akta hai
 Tere[C] pavan naam ke [D]main
 Jai jai k[C]ar karta[Em] hu
 ....
 ....
Varse 2
 [Em]Aasmaan ke neche
 [C]Manushaw ke beech main
 [C]Koe aur naam nahi...
 [D]Koe aur naam nahi x2
 [C]Papo se deta [D]nasaam yeshu naam
 [Em]Har gunaho jo tod ta hai
 [C]Papo se deta [D]nasaam yeshu naam
 [G]Har gunaho jo tod ta hai
